enhanced_by.reason: The Digester needs to be initialized before adding ValidatorActions, as it is used in the processing of ValidatorResources.
Processing the ValidatorResources ensures that all necessary state is set up before adding new ValidatorActions.
After adding a ValidatorAction, verifying its presence using getValidatorAction can help in constructing assertions.
Checking the entire list of ValidatorActions can help in verifying the state of the ValidatorResources after adding a new action.
